documents.title: Factor Form Weekly Tech - Business Sync
documents.content:
ÔªøDec 17, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Pantelis Chatzinikolis





Notes

* Demo - OTP on production

* How to test OTP on production

* Vouchers to apply the correct discounts (source)

   * OTP price: X (fixed) = the original prices

      * (OTP can‚Äôt be discounted with a voucher)

   * SNS:

      * First box: MOV >= $65 ‚Üí 40% off the OTP price, less than threshold‚Üí 20% off

      * Second box onward: MOV >= $65‚Üí 20% off the OTP price, less than threshold‚Üí 10% off

* New discount banner feature?!









Action items

* 



Dec 10, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian jordon.smith@hellofresh.ca Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Pantelis Chatzinikolis





Notes

* Add new meal_swap #s for Creatine + Meal Shake before launch ‚Üí we‚Äôll def do so ‚Üí Hamed to add it to the roadmap items for Jan

* OTP Launch update ‚Üí 

* [Shindy] W49: large week for tech errors Factor Form | CC Errors.xlsx ‚Üí For Shindy and Hamed to investigate

* 50% off discount id comm needs to be created

   * Hamed to double check the banner behaviour

   * Amy/Laura to confirm with Megan Thomson/





Options

	Pros

	Cons

	Decision

	Launch W50

	More time before AD/ND

Time to iterate if issues

Time to rollout gradually





	Won‚Äôt make it! 

Less time for e2e testing

	No Go

	Launch W51 (To 90% of users)

	Original plan

On-track from dev pov

Captures business value earlier (~$15k in revenue)





	Super risky as most devs are out (Jordon, Jan, Edwin, Emily, Daniel, Travis)

Super close to EOY

Might break something on Factor

Not enough time for gradual rollout

On-calls: Emily Stanek (W50), Paul Andrews (W51/52)

	Maybe

	Launch W51 

(To only 10%)

	Mitigates the risk

Collects some feedback before the peak

	Still risky (Not enough devs to support)

Limited business impact





	No Go

	Launch W02

(To 90% of users)

	Less risky (Devs available for support)

Still before the actual peak

Won‚Äôt break anything on Factor/FF

	Delayed launch

Opportunity cost





	Go! 













	  W46 2024 - W04 2025 ‚Üí The market is pretty soft over the last few weeks of the year

Action items

* Dec 3, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian jordon.smith@hellofresh.ca Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Pantelis Chatzinikolis Sandhya Reddy Wellney Yarra





Notes

* Demo the mobile app prototypes





Action items

* 



Nov 26, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Laura Loughran





Notes

* Present the OTP new flows

* 



Action items

* 



Nov 19, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov





Notes

* Laura‚Äôs crazy idea to gate the 50% off for a year to Factor Actives, +$65

   * Jordan‚Äôs less crazy idea to check old logic ‚Üí if RTE active, apply this voucher 

   * If not RTE active, default back to regular voucher (40% off)





* Tyler EpidyAmy Cheong email comms with active users about

   * Price changes for Protein and Hydrations, email template here: Protein and



marketing plans for OTP on FF website

* CC: Ronald Weston and his team

   * OTP only supports cancel and refund (doesn‚Äôt support change to the order, delivery address, delivery date, or the items in the order)

* Fulfillment & Delivery: Shindy Lu

   * We can‚Äôt test the delivery on staging, so we should test it on production before launch. 

      * Make sure that Propac gets the order info accurately

NPD (Meal Shake/Creatine)

* What to show on the product tiles in the meantime?

   * ‚ÄúBuy on Amazon‚Äù vs. ‚ÄúBuy on Shopify‚Äù ‚Üí Finalizing the decision: we‚Äôre not going with the ‚ÄúNotify me‚Äù option, so no need to build the modals.  





Action items

* Tyler to sync up with Jordon to find out the right event to use for the OTP confirmation as well as cart abandonment ‚Üí sales event QA good chop (nov 2025) 

* Simon to work on distinction between OTP & SNS ‚Üí Hamed and Alexandra are working on it

* Tyler to send an email about raising the price on Hydrations & Proteins

* Hamed to sync up with Ronald about the CC issues





Nov 4, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran





Notes

* Cancelling as there‚Äôs no agenda + Laura is out





Action items

* 



Oct 28, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Tess Cavalieri Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tyler Epidy





Notes

* Align on the Pricing for OTP vs. SNS (open questions on Factor Form | One Time Purchase)





Action items

* 



Oct 23, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Jordon Smith





Notes

* OTP flow

   * Decision: stick to the initial flow Megha designed, no changes to the BAU flow.

* [WIP] VMS - Optimizing User Journeys

   * Previous experiment showed us that having the sliding cart was bad for CVR, this does not mean carts are bad or sending users to checkout is good, we should retest carts and where to send users after they add to cart

   * 



Action items

* 







[a]2 total reactions

Jordon Smith reacted with üò≠ at 2025-11-19 15:30 PM

Hamed Karimian reacted with üò≠ at 2025-11-19 16:17 PM

documents.title: New Ventures Tribe - Weekly Standup Notes
documents.content:
ÔªøGeneral Updates

New Ventures & Ecosystems

Weekly Standup 

TEMPLATE

Team and People Updates

üë™ People Updates

* Team members out this week:

   * * Team members coming back this week:

   * * Engineers on-call this week:

   * L2 - New Ventures - 

üíÉ Social Updates

* None this week

ü§ñ Gen AI

* None this week









2025-W51

Team and People Updates

üë™ People Updates

* Team members out this week:

   * Madeeha Hasan

   * Tavi Scandiff-Pirvu

   * Liman Labaran

   * Oliver Strobel

   * Pedro √Åvila

   * (A-Dos) Arbaaz Dossani

   * Ahmed Wagdi out from Dec 17  - Dec 19

   * Edwin Torres out from Dec 17  - Dec 19

   * Romina Nicastro working from üá¶üá∑

   * Daniel Arias working from üá®üá¶

   * Alexander Matlin & Beatrice Dimarucut working from üá∫üá∏

* Team members coming back this week:

   * Andrea Martins

ü•• Team Updates

* Engineers on-call this week:

   * L2 - New Ventures - Matheus Bolognini

   * L2 - RTE Systems/NV Systems - Morteza Pourkazemi

   * Q1 2026 New Ventures On-Call is Open for Volunteers! üí∞2026 New Ventures Tribe - On-call Rotations

* Peak considerations - keep an eye on Approved Deployment & No deployment Days

   * Peak Release Calendar Peak 2026 - Release Calendars and Opt-In List - Next AD/ND days are Dec 20 - Jan 18

* Sprint alignment across Hellotech

   * First sprint of 2026 should start Jan 5 for all squads

   * At the end of every sprint, we will have a tribe-wide demo which will be recorded and shared. The first will be on Fri, Jan 16

üíÉ Social Updates

* None this week









2025-W50

Team and People Updates

üë™ People Updates

* Team members out this week:

   * Andrea Martins

   * Madeeha Hasan

   * Tavi Scandiff-Pirvu

   * Liman Labaran

   * Oliver Strobel

   * Elena Pavlova until Thurs

   * Pedro √Åvila working from üáßüá∑

   * Ahmed Wagdi working from üá™üá¨

   * Sneha Gupta out starting Wed

   * Daniel Arias Wanderley Teixeira Philip Tauro Beatrice Dimarucut Edwin Torres out on Fri

* Team members coming back this week:

   * D√©sir√©e Lima on Wed

ü•• Team Updates

* Engineers on-call this week:

   * L2 - New Ventures - Himash Tehan

   * L2 - RTE Systems/NV Systems - Albert Liu

   * Q1 2026 New Ventures On-Call is Open for Volunteers! üí∞2026 New Ventures Tribe - On-call Rotations - consisting of 2 rotations: 

      * L2 - New Ventures: Supporting the client TRE used by TPT, GoodChop & VMS brands

      * L2 - Market Innovation (currently RTE Systems): Supporting the backend services New Ventures owns (previously TAM) until they are deprecated/handover over

* House keeping

   * Peak considerations - keep an eye on Approved Deployment & No deployment Days

      * Peak Release Calendar Peak 2026 - Release Calendars and Opt-In List - Next AD/NA is Dec 20 - Jan 18

      * Peak Web Readiness Checklist: 2026 Peak Prep - Web & React Native Clients Checklist

üíÉ Social Updates

* Anthropic is visiting HF on 16.12.2026 - checkout clan-genai for deets

* New Ventures Tribe Berlin New Years Dinner - Jan 27 2026

   * Please RSVP asap

* New Ventures Toronto Xmas Dinner - Dec 18 2025

   * Please RSVP by Dec 10, 2025





2025-W49

Team and People Updates

üë™ People Updates

* Team members out this week:

   * D√©sir√©e Lima

   * Andrea Martins

   * Elena Pavlova

   * Maksim Burov until Thursday

   * Lucas Freire Torres Cruz Pedro √Åvila working from üáßüá∑

   * Ahmed Wagdi working from üá™üá¨

* Team members coming back this week:

   * Nikita Gorshkov 

* Engineers on-call this week:

   * L2 - New Ventures - Oliver Strobel

   * L2 - RTE Systems/NV Systems - Ciro da Silva da Costa

   * Will be shar



ams to clarify the implementation of the monthly delivery and the physical incentives for vouchers. 

________________

2021-W13

üõ£Ô∏è Q2+Q3 Roadmap

Solenne, Ahmed, Tobias and I sat down and put our planned projects into a roadmap for Q2 and Q3. Tobias and Solenne presented this roadmap to Yoav and Annie and received good feedback about it. In the second tab of the spreadsheet we listed the priorities, with Porterhouse leading the list. Whenever we have to make a hard choice between two deliveries, we will decide for the one with the higher priority. That makes projects with lower priority more likely to be delayed than the ones with higher priority. If you have any concern of a high-priority project, please let Tobias and Solenne know as soon as possible.

üíª Tech Initiatives

                                                                                                                                    * The BFF migration in the mobile app is almost almost almost complete. We can expect the initiative to be complete early next week. There are still some cleaning up to do on web and mobile.

                                                                                                                                    * Last week we implemented a proof of concept of how we can migrate route access control to react components, and this we started with the migration of the access control function for the Cancellation page. By the end of next week, we should have also migrated the Delivery Tracking and RaF routes.

üí∏ Additional Vouchers

One of Engagement's sprint goals is to support Additional Vouchers in our price calculation logic for web and mobile. This week we started working on the website, refactoring the voucher Redux logic (üçù) and implementing the action to fetch a subscription's additional voucher info.

üî™ Killing Alice

This week we removed the last API call to Alice: update payment method in web. Before Alice is really killed in Intfood (expected mid April), we will need to do a force update of our mobile app to prevent users from using old versions that are still using the old endpoints.

üõí Add-ons

The Happiness team started to implement some changes for Add-Ons, and was able to setup some add-ons SKUs in staging.













‚Äî

Previous Notes Location: https://www.notion.so/New-Brands-Retention-Weekly-Notes-c227bcddd153472f841114c2603de18d

   * Peak Release Calendar Peak 2026 - Release Calendars and Opt-In List - Next AD/ND days are Dec 20 - Jan 18

* Sprint alignment across Hellotech

   * First sprint of 2026 should start Jan 5 for all squads

   * At the end of every sprint, we will have a tribe-wide demo which will be recorded and shared. The first will be on Fri, Jan 16

üíÉ Social Updates

* None this week









2025-W50

Team and People Updates

üë™ People Updates

* Team members out this week:

   * Andrea Martins

   * Madeeha Hasan

   * Tavi Scandiff-Pirvu

   * Liman Labaran

   * Oliver Strobel

   * Elena Pavlova until Thurs

   * Pedro √Åvila working from üáßüá∑

   * Ahmed Wagdi working from üá™üá¨

   * Sneha Gupta out starting Wed

   * Daniel Arias Wanderley Teixeira Philip Tauro Beatrice Dimarucut Edwin Torres out on Fri

* Team members coming back this week:

   * D√©sir√©e Lima on Wed

ü•• Team Updates

* Engineers on-call this week:

   * L2 - New Ventures - Himash Tehan

   * L2 - RTE Systems/NV Systems - Albert Liu

   * Q1 2026 New Ventures On-Call is Open for Volunteers! üí∞2026 New Ventures Tribe - On-call Rotations - consisting of 2 rotations: 

      * L2 - New Ventures: Supporting the client TRE used by TPT, GoodChop & VMS brands

      * L2 - Market Innovation (currently RTE Systems): Supporting the backend services New Ventures owns (previously TAM) until they are deprecated/handover over

* House keeping

   * Peak considerations - keep an eye on Approved Deployment & No deployment Days

      * Peak Release Calendar Peak 2026 - Release Calendars and Opt-In List - Next AD/NA is Dec 20 - Jan 18

      * Peak Web Readiness Checklist: 2026 Peak Prep - Web & React Native Clients Checklist

üíÉ Social Updates

* Anthropic is visiting HF on 16.12.2026 - checkout clan-genai for deets

* New Ventures Tribe Berlin New Years Dinner - Jan 27 2026

   * Please RSVP asap

* New Ventures Toronto Xmas Dinner - Dec 18 2025

   * Please RSVP by Dec 10, 2025





2025-W49

Team and People Updates

üë™ People Updates

* Team members out this week:

   * D√©sir√©e Lima

   * Andrea Martins

   * Elena Pavlova

   * Maksim Burov until Thursday

   * Lucas Freire Torres Cruz Pedro √Åvila working from üáßüá∑

   * Ahmed Wagdi working from üá™üá¨

* Team members coming back this week:

   * Nikita Gorshkov 

* Engineers on-call this week:

   * L2 - New Ventures - Oliver Strobel

   * L2 - RTE Systems/NV Systems - Ciro da Silva da Costa

   * Will be shar



ams to clarify the implementation of the monthly delivery and the physical incentives for vouchers. 

________________

2021-W13

üõ£Ô∏è Q2+Q3 Roadmap

Solenne, Ahmed, Tobias and I sat down and put our planned projects into a roadmap for Q2 and Q3. Tobias and Solenne presented this roadmap to Yoav and Annie and received good feedback about it. In the second tab of the spreadsheet we listed the priorities, with Porterhouse leading the list. Whenever we have to make a hard choice between two deliveries, we will decide for the one with the higher priority. That makes projects with lower priority more likely to be delayed than the ones with higher priority. If you have any concern of a high-priority project, please let Tobias and Solenne know as soon as possible.

üíª Tech Initiatives

                                                                                                                                    * The BFF migration in the mobile app is almost almost almost complete. We can expect the initiative to be complete early next week. There are still some cleaning up to do on web and mobile.

                                                                                                                                    * Last week we implemented a proof of concept of how we can migrate route access control to react components, and this we started with the migration of the access control function for the Cancellation page. By the end of next week, we should have also migrated the Delivery Tracking and RaF routes.

üí∏ Additional Vouchers

One of Engagement's sprint goals is to support Additional Vouchers in our price calculation logic for web and mobile. This week we started working on the website, refactoring the voucher Redux logic (üçù) and implementing the action to fetch a subscription's additional voucher info.

üî™ Killing Alice

This week we removed the last API call to Alice: update payment method in web. Before Alice is really killed in Intfood (expected mid April), we will need to do a force update of our mobile app to prevent users from using old versions that are still using the old endpoints.

üõí Add-ons

The Happiness team started to implement some changes for Add-Ons, and was able to setup some add-ons SKUs in staging.













‚Äî

Previous Notes Location: https://www.notion.so/New-Brands-Retention-Weekly-Notes-c227bcddd153472f841114c2603de18d

documents.title: Factor Form Weekly Tech - Business Sync
documents.content:
ÔªøDec 17, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Pantelis Chatzinikolis





Notes

* Demo - OTP on production

* How to test OTP on production

* Vouchers to apply the correct discounts (source)

   * OTP price: X (fixed) = the original prices

      * (OTP can‚Äôt be discounted with a voucher)

   * SNS:

      * First box: MOV >= $65 ‚Üí 40% off the OTP price, less than threshold‚Üí 20% off

      * Second box onward: MOV >= $65‚Üí 20% off the OTP price, less than threshold‚Üí 10% off

* New discount banner feature?!









Action items

* 



Dec 10, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian jordon.smith@hellofresh.ca Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Pantelis Chatzinikolis





Notes

* Add new meal_swap #s for Creatine + Meal Shake before launch ‚Üí we‚Äôll def do so ‚Üí Hamed to add it to the roadmap items for Jan

* OTP Launch update ‚Üí 

* [Shindy] W49: large week for tech errors Factor Form | CC Errors.xlsx ‚Üí For Shindy and Hamed to investigate

* 50% off discount id comm needs to be created

   * Hamed to double check the banner behaviour

   * Amy/Laura to confirm with Megan Thomson/





Options

	Pros

	Cons

	Decision

	Launch W50

	More time before AD/ND

Time to iterate if issues

Time to rollout gradually





	Won‚Äôt make it! 

Less time for e2e testing

	No Go

	Launch W51 (To 90% of users)

	Original plan

On-track from dev pov

Captures business value earlier (~$15k in revenue)





	Super risky as most devs are out (Jordon, Jan, Edwin, Emily, Daniel, Travis)

Super close to EOY

Might break something on Factor

Not enough time for gradual rollout

On-calls: Emily Stanek (W50), Paul Andrews (W51/52)

	Maybe

	Launch W51 

(To only 10%)

	Mitigates the risk

Collects some feedback before the peak

	Still risky (Not enough devs to support)

Limited business impact





	No Go

	Launch W02

(To 90% of users)

	Less risky (Devs available for support)

Still before the actual peak

Won‚Äôt break anything on Factor/FF

	Delayed launch

Opportunity cost





	Go! 













	  W46 2024 - W04 2025 ‚Üí The market is pretty soft over the last few weeks of the year

Action items

* Dec 3, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian jordon.smith@hellofresh.ca Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Pantelis Chatzinikolis Sandhya Reddy Wellney Yarra





Notes

* Demo the mobile app prototypes





Action items

* 



Nov 26, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Laura Loughran





Notes

* Present the OTP new flows

* 



Action items

* 



Nov 19, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov





Notes

* Laura‚Äôs crazy idea to gate the 50% off for a year to Factor Actives, +$65

   * Jordan‚Äôs less crazy idea to check old logic ‚Üí if RTE active, apply this voucher 

   * If not RTE active, default back to regular voucher (40% off)





* Tyler EpidyAmy Cheong email comms with active users about

   * Price changes for Protein and Hydrations, email template here: Protein and



marketing plans for OTP on FF website

* CC: Ronald Weston and his team

   * OTP only supports cancel and refund (doesn‚Äôt support change to the order, delivery address, delivery date, or the items in the order)

* Fulfillment & Delivery: Shindy Lu

   * We can‚Äôt test the delivery on staging, so we should test it on production before launch. 

      * Make sure that Propac gets the order info accurately

NPD (Meal Shake/Creatine)

* What to show on the product tiles in the meantime?

   * ‚ÄúBuy on Amazon‚Äù vs. ‚ÄúBuy on Shopify‚Äù ‚Üí Finalizing the decision: we‚Äôre not going with the ‚ÄúNotify me‚Äù option, so no need to build the modals.  





Action items

* Tyler to sync up with Jordon to find out the right event to use for the OTP confirmation as well as cart abandonment ‚Üí sales event QA good chop (nov 2025) 

* Simon to work on distinction between OTP & SNS ‚Üí Hamed and Alexandra are working on it

* Tyler to send an email about raising the price on Hydrations & Proteins

* Hamed to sync up with Ronald about the CC issues





Nov 4, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Nikita Gorshkov Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran





Notes

* Cancelling as there‚Äôs no agenda + Laura is out





Action items

* 



Oct 28, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Jordon Smith Amy Cheong Tess Cavalieri Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tyler Epidy





Notes

* Align on the Pricing for OTP vs. SNS (open questions on Factor Form | One Time Purchase)





Action items

* 



Oct 23, 2025 | Weekly Tech-Biz Sync up

Attendees: Wellney Yarra Laura Loughran Hamed Karimian Amy Cheong Ben Nasseby Shindy Lu Tess Cavalieri Tyler Epidy Simon Perez Michael James Clarke Jordon Smith





Notes

* OTP flow

   * Decision: stick to the initial flow Megha designed, no changes to the BAU flow.

* [WIP] VMS - Optimizing User Journeys

   * Previous experiment showed us that having the sliding cart was bad for CVR, this does not mean carts are bad or sending users to checkout is good, we should retest carts and where to send users after they add to cart

   * 



Action items

* 







[a]2 total reactions

Jordon Smith reacted with üò≠ at 2025-11-19 15:30 PM

Hamed Karimian reacted with üò≠ at 2025-11-19 16:17 PM
